    • filterServiceCodeList

      public BillingFormData.BillingService[] filterServiceCodeList(BillingFormData.BillingService[] svcList, Demographic d)
      Filters a list of BillingService objects according to the supplied Demographic data The filter essentially creates a new list with the codes that pertain to the specified Demographic record's age and gender
      Parameters:
      svcList - BillingService[]
      d - Demographic
      Returns:
      BillingService[]

      public boolean hasMore00120Codes(String demoNo, String cnslCode, String serviceDate)

      Parameters:
      demoNo - String
      Returns:
      boolean

    • getPatientManagementStatus

      public int getPatientManagementStatus(String demoNo, String code, String serviceDate)
      Returns true if the 14015 code is billable for the specified demographic number. The rules are as follows: A maximum of 6 units may be billed per calendar year A maximum of 4 units may be billed on any given day
      Parameters:
      demoNo - String - The uid of the patient
      code - String - The service code to be evaluated
      serviceDate - String - The date of service
      Returns:
      0 if more service units available, 1 if annual max units consumed, 2 if daily max units consumed

    • getCountAvailablePatientManagementUnits

      public Map<String,Double> getCountAvailablePatientManagementUnits(String demoNo, String code, String serviceDate)
      Parameters:
      demoNo - String
      code - String
      serviceDate - String
      Returns:
      double
